name: The QuizShow
description:
You won a lottery, the prize tho , it was wierd , you where able to participate to a quiz show . But there is a twist , everytime you get a question wrong , you get transported to another dimension , if you are wrong to many times , he will ... you know....

(the worlds are auto generated)

AND YES settings dont work....

THE GAME HAS A LOT OF BUG , I think , its a gamejam game so don't judge I mean do but i hpe it's understandable.
